Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class of the game. Handle the player's action. Contains infor about the player's name, currentRoom, previousRoom, the maximum weight the player can carry, list of items player is carrying.

      • eat

        public java.lang.String eat​(java.lang.String name)
        The player eats an item. Remove the item from the current room or from the map of items the player is carrying.
        Parameters:
        the - name of the item the player eats.
        Returns:
        a String notifying that the player just ate or null if the player failed to eat the item.

      • eatToBeStronger

        public java.lang.String eatToBeStronger​(java.lang.String food,
                                        int addedPounds)
        Eat and increase strength.
        Parameters:
        the - name of the item the player eats.
        the - number of pounds added to the player's maximum weight.
        Returns:
        a String notifying whether or not the player successfully eats the item.

      • useItem

        public java.lang.String useItem​(java.lang.String name)
        The player uses an item that he/she is carrying. Remove that item from the pickedItems.
        Parameters:
        the - name of the item.
        Returns:
        the name of the item if the player uses it successfully, null if the player doesn't.

      • containsItem

        public boolean containsItem​(java.lang.String name)
        Check if the player is carrying an item.
        Parameters:
        the - name of the item.
        Returns:
        true if the player is carrying the item

      • back

        public java.lang.String back()
        Come back to the previous room.

      • wantToUnlockExits

        public java.lang.String wantToUnlockExits​(java.lang.String itemName)
        Give an item to a NPC to unlock all the exits of the current room.
        Returns:
        a notification whether or not exchanging item for help is successful.

      • getCurrentRoomExit

        public Room getCurrentRoomExit​(java.lang.String direction)
        Get an exit of the current room the player is in.
        Returns:
        the room that the exit leads to

      • unlockEnterRoom

        public java.lang.String unlockEnterRoom​(java.lang.String direction,
                                        java.lang.String key)
        Unlock if an exit is locked using a specified item and enter the room.
        Parameters:
        the - exit.
        the - name of the item used to unlock the exit.
        Returns:
        notification whether unlocking and entering room is successful.
